snippet: Lt. Richard Nappi, a 17-year-veteran, began feeling dizzy and went into cardiac arrest, becoming the first city firefighter to die in the line of duty since August 2009.
abstract: Lt. Richard Nappi, a 17-year-veteran, began feeling dizzy and went into cardiac arrest, becoming the first city firefighter to die in the line of duty since August 2009.

headline.main: Fire Lieutenant Dies Fighting Brooklyn Warehouse Blaze
headline.print_headline: City Firefighter Dies After Battling Blaze in Warehouse
